description:
List of field identifiers or Flatline expressions
                 describing the outputs to be generated.

name.description: For a single generated field, its name.

names.description: A list of names, one per generated field.

optype.description:
For a single generated field, its optype.
                       If many fields are generated by this entry, all
                       will have this default.

optypes.description: A list of optypes, one per generated field.

label.description: A label for the generated field, when there's only one.

description.description: Description of the field, when there's only one.

generator.description:
A Flatline expression that generates
                       one or more fields.

json_generator.description: When generator is a sexp, its JSON representation.

ids.description: List of ids for fields generated by this generator.
